title: Applesauce
ingredients: 6 medium cooking apples, peeled, cored, thinly sliced

Place the apples in a 2-quart glass casserole and add the water, cover and cook for 8 minutes stirring only after they have cooked 4 minutes.  Cook the apples until the slices are soft.  While still hot, place the cooked apples in a blender and add the sugar and the other ingredients and puree.
Taste and adjust the sugar and spices.
source: Microwave:  A Medley of Fruits by Jack Denton Scott, Bon Appétit, March 1978.
